channel.title: [YunoHost]: Self-host your federated instance now!
channel.description:
_Give to @decentral1se. Comes from https://socialhub.network/t/yunohost-self-host-your-federated-instance-now/651_
The [YunoHost](https://yunohost.org) community packagers understand that a big part of making federation work is making it possible for more people to get involved in self-hosting their own instances. And that’s why they’re busy with making a lot of the federated applications you already know and use available for self-hosting on YunoHost!
Here’s the list of community applications:
* https://github.com/YunoHost-Apps/mastodon_ynh * https://github.com/YunoHost-Apps/peertube_ynh * [https://github.com/YunoHost-Apps/reel2bits_ynh ](https://github.com/YunoHost-Apps/reel2bits_ynh) * https://github.com/YunoHost-Apps/pleroma_ynh * https://github.com/YunoHost-Apps/funkwhale_ynh * https://github.com/YunoHost-Apps/pixelfed_ynh * [https://github.com/YunoHost-Apps/writefreely_ynh ](https://github.com/YunoHost-Apps/writefreely_ynh) * [https://github.com/YunoHost-Apps/anfora_ynh ](https://github.com/YunoHost-Apps/anfora_ynh) * https://github.com/YunoHost-Apps/plume_ynh * [https://github.com/YunoHost-Apps/friendica_ynh ](https://github.com/YunoHost-Apps/friendica_ynh)
Each application is packaged by a member of the YunoHost community. To get started, head over to [https://yunohost.org/#/ ](https://yunohost.org/#/). If you have questions, need support or want to join the YunoHost community, please head over to https://forum.yunohost.org/.
